item.title: About us
item.description: Tachyon Research.Ltd is a fast-growing quantitative investment company that manages company directors’ family and company assets.Our team members come from major investment banks,major accounting firms, Chinese top securities companies, and researchers from top overseas universities,master’s and doctoral degrees account for100% of the company’s employees.We have thirteen developed quantitative trading models and issue independent investment research reports on major assets every month. The companyâ€™s main trading and research underlyings are stocks,bonds,foreign exchange,commodities and index funds in the secondary market.
